channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 乔治-索罗斯（George Soros）旗下价值 250 亿美元的非营利组织总裁即将卸任，这是他的儿子接管基金会以来的最新变动
item.description:
The president of George Soros’s $25 billion nonprofit is stepping down, the latest change since his son took over the foundation https://t.co/oLaetpjNsk https://t.co/oLaetpjNsk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）可能已经缩减了企业气候披露新规的范围，但财务主管们在准备遵守新规时仍面临诸多挑战和成本问题
item.description:
The Securities and Exchange Commission may have dialed back the extent of its new corporate climate-disclosure rule, but finance chiefs still face plenty of challenges and costs as they prepare to comply https://t.co/e6CBeiPSe0 https://t.co/e6CBeiPSe0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 柯克-考辛斯多年来一直在为自己下注。现在，他即将在自由球员市场上再次发财，为他有史以来最赚钱的职业生涯再添一笔。

item.title: 约翰-柯蒂斯领导着一个相当不寻常的气候联盟。这位共和党议员在三年前成立了保守派气候核心小组。其主要任务是让成员们能够自如地思考和讨论气候问题。
item.description:
John Curtis leads a rather unusual climate coalition. The Republican congressman founded the Conservative Climate Caucus three years ago. Its main mission is to get its members comfortable with thinking and talking about climate. https://t.co/Ke9tvG3Wqw https://t.co/Ke9tvG3Wqw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 白宫周一表示，美国住房和城市发展部部长玛西娅-福吉（Marcia Fudge）将于本月晚些时候卸任联邦住房机构负责人一职。
item.description:
U.S. Housing and Urban Development Secretary Marcia Fudge will be stepping down as head of the federal housing agency later this month, the White House said Monday https://t.co/G46WI81sDp https://t.co/G46WI81sDp

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 看：肯辛顿宫发布的一张威尔士王妃拥抱孩子的篡改图片引发了一系列阴谋论，人们质疑王室对王妃健康状况的透明度。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约州西部一个自称是汉堡包发源地的小镇正在酝酿一项计划：在空中放一个巨型汉堡来吸引游客它将 "成为我们的象征"。
item.description:

item.title: 拜登总统提出的预算案将把下一财年的联邦开支提高到 7.3 万亿美元，并提高对富人和大公司的税收

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：当哈马斯看到政治风向最终转向对其有利时，它为什么要暂停行动并放弃人质？@ElliotKaufman6写道：拜登的政治转向和对拉法的辩护迄今为止已将人质交易推到了风口浪尖。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Why would Hamas call time out and give up its hostages when it sees the political winds finally shifting in its favor? Biden’s political turn and defense of Rafah has so far pushed a hostage deal off the table, writes @ElliotKaufman6 https://t.co/KqvkD3DdRV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: Reddit 正朝着股票发行的方向迈进，这可能是今年迄今为止美国最大的 IPO 之一。以下是这家社交媒体公司计划首次公开募股的一些重要信息。

item.title: 前法拉利车手费利佩-马萨（Felipe Massa）声称，F1官员掩盖了被称为 "撞车门"（Crashgate）的操纵比赛丑闻，使他失去了冠军头衔。他还要求赔偿 8000 多万美元。
item.description:
Former Ferrari driver Felipe Massa alleges that the fallout of a race-fixing scandal known as Crashgate was covered up by F1 officials and cost him a title. He is also seeking more than $80 million in damages. https://t.co/oYKNRIQTxy https://t.co/oYKNRIQTxy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国数以百计的工作岗位是根据性别和种族来划分的？查看数据，了解美国许多最重要的职业是如何对工人进行分类的。
item.description:

item.title: 从伐木到牙科卫生，美国有许多职业几乎完全由女性或男性从事。我们采访了四位选择了与众不同工作的人，他们在这些工作中找到了收获和挑战。
item.description:
From logging to dental hygiene, many occupations in the U.S. are done almost entirely by women or almost entirely by men. We spoke to four people who chose jobs where they are outliers—and are finding rewards and challenges. https://t.co/yFjMcSFCw9 https://t.co/yFjMcSFCw9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/0kwW8tfou6 https://t.co/0kwW8tfou6

item.title: 比特币周一攀升至历史新高，因为另一个监管机构为更广泛的加密货币投资铺平了道路。比特币最近的交易价格超过了 72200 美元。
